text:
Good morning, Amana.
You're full of energy from the morning.

Because we have lessons starting today!
I can't wait to get moving!

I've prepared thoroughly for the training camp,
brought lots of things that might come in handy~

Oh yeah...
It was quite a heavy load, now that I think about it.

Hehe... yeah...
I ended up adding more stuff as I went along.

Brand new towels~, plenty of changes of clothes...
Even my usual conditioner...
But but, the highlight of this time is~ ta-da!

Oh... new shoes?
They look great.

They're lightweight and super comfortable to move in!
I feel like I could do lessons all day in them!

Haha, that's reassuring.
Keep up the good work with that.

I want to work hard
until these shoes are worn out!
